reviewDescription: Lovely bottle! Nice weight to it whilst staying lightweight Nicely made and a great size Very happy with purchase

Absolutely love my new copper water containers. Beautifully crafted. Arrived sooner than I expected. I have gotten so many compliments on them. They are easy to clean and letting water sit in them overnight you can really taste the difference. I will order more as gifts. Wish I hadn't waited so long or I could have given out for xmas. Makes drinking water so much more fun.

Very beautiful, always getting compliments. If the top is not on tight will leak otherwise is very leak proof. I have had it for a few weeks and the top has begun to ruay it's time to wash it. But I've kept water in it day and night. Keeps cold water cold, love it.

reviewTitle: Bit expensive, not so easy to clean
reviewDescription: Not so easy to clean, a bit expensive, but I like using it daily.
Good bottle. Nice design. Makes a sound while opening and closing.
This copper bottle is awesome and beautiful. I will buy more for sure
